name: Squid Stew with Peas
description: Fresh squid slowly cooked in a stew with fresh peas and tomatoes reveal an explosion of flavors.

name: Tortellini in Chicken Broth
description: Our homemade tortellini, filled with meat, float in a warm chicken broth, bringing you comfort.

name: Shrimp and Vegetable Salad
description: A fresh mixed salad with cooked shrimp, seasonal vegetables, and a secret dressing that enhances every bite.

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet topped with a tangy lemon butter sauce.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Classic beef stroganoff cooked with creamy mushroom sauce and served over egg noodles.

name: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, ricotta, spinach, and marinara sauce, baked to perfection.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich chocolate cake with a warm, gooey center that melts in your mouth.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with espresso-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.
